Advocate for Immigrant Justice

How to Advocate

  • Mail, call, or visit your state and US representatives and senators. Personal stories and direct contact make a difference.
  • You can also send letters to people who have control over what happens, like MASSPort and other agencies.
  • Encourage your friends and community to advocate as well—collective voices are powerful.

Resources

  • eMail your congressional representatives to rein in ICE (Concord Indivisible
  • Send postcards to swing states (TurnoutPAC)
